entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Race condition in building ILLink props #90702
  • [API Proposal]: Get default value of a `Type` #90697
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Assertion failed in 'System.Numerics.BigIntegerCalculator:PowCore during 'Generate code' #90693
    8.0.0
  • [Mono WASM + AOT] `Environment.Exit` does not work together with exception handling #90692
  • BDN randomly crashes on Linux? #90691
  • Condfig binder gen: further tighten filtering constraint for input binding method invocations #90687
    8.0.0
  • [Quality Week Design Proposal] Clean up structure of artifacts/log #90682
    Future
  • Implement memory-mapped stress log for NativeAOT #90677
    Future
  • Implement standalone GC loading in NativeAOT #90676
    Future
  • Move dynamic heap sample inside GC pause #90675
    Future
  • Support infinite size, commit-on-demand, NoGCRegion #90674
    Future
  • Avoid wasted commit in NoGCRegions #90672
    Future
  • [WASM] Add telemetry to track the use of WasmStripILAfterAOT #90671
    9.0.0
  • System.Text.Json: serialize dictionary with JsonExtensionData ignores DefaultIgnoreCondition option #90670
  • NetworkStream.ReadAsync runs slower on ubuntu than on windows #90664
  • Document Networking metrics #90663
    8.0.0
  • [android] Ensure unique assembly names in runtime test bundles for android #90661
    9.0.0
  • AOT: Delegate.CreateDelegate throws attempting to JIT compile method #90660
  • Assembly.Location returns `/` instead of the actual path intermittently #90657
  • Getting 400 error when I dont pass the object property in .Net 7 API #90653

Closed

  • Logging source generator generates uncompilable code for new .NET Framework project #83393
    8.0.0
  • Assert failure: (g_gc_lowest_address <= address) && (address <= g_gc_highest_address) #90447
    8.0.0
  • Awkward Time Format Patterns on Linux. No Space Before AM/PM Designator. #90627
    9.0.0
  • EventPipe support for Native AOT #83051
    8.0.0
  • [ NativeAOT ] EXEC : error : VTable of type 'ListEnumerator`1<ClassLibrary1.Foo>' not computed by the IL scanner. You can work around by running the compilation with scanner disabled. #90382
  • Timers in Blazor WebAssembly halt at specific times #90609
    7.0.x
  • Patch/hotfix for .NET 6 application unsuccessful #82273
  • InlineArray[Valid]/[Invalid] Runtime tests are failing for Mono miniJIT and interpreter #90398
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Invalid ldp optimization with locals #85765
    8.0.0
  • Issue with DateTime.Parse in Blazor WebAssembly #89844
    6.0.x
  • [WASI] wasiconsole template: Instructions in generated README.md incorrect #90482
    8.0.0
  • Unable to inject IKeyedServiceProvider into service with .NET 8 Preview 7 #90528
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 15 Regressions in Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection #89104
    8.0.0
  • [Mono][Android] Test app crashed on exit #54911
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: the keyed service registration serviceKey non-nullable #90322
    8.0.0
  • [Long Running Test] 'System.Net.Sockets.Tests.SendReceive_SyncForceNonBlocking.SendRecv_Stream_TCP' #89784
    9.0.0
  • R2RDump - Expand diffing functionality #10997
    Future
  • Allow StructLayoutAttribute to specify automatic size rounding up to next power of 2 for better perf #11029
    Future
  • [Question] Lazy image relocations #11244
    Future
  • OutOfMemoryException instead of OOM Killer #11300
    Future
  • [Android] Segmentation fault in libcoreclr.so #11661
    Future
  • Telemetry target fails in rc1 #90584
  • Incorrect alignment of reference struct within a struct on Mono #90531
  • ToFrozenDictionary function throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException exception in .Net 8 Pewview 7 #90567
    8.0.0
  • JsonConstructorAttribute not working for private/internal ctor in .NET 8.0 preview7 #90577
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [IGNORE][wasm] chrome versions #90708
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Fix Shuffling Thunks part 2 #90707
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add collections with all marshaller methods on the marshallers #90706
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [main] [release/8.0] Do not set fetch depth on source-build #90705
    needs-area-label
  • Adding PACKAGE.md to System.Runtime.Caching package #90701
    area-System.Runtime.Caching
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Temporary fix for ldp/stp optimizations - with test fix #90700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • Revert changes to HasNativeCodeReJitAware #90696
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix PortableRuntimeIdentifierGraph.json not found during runtime repo source build #90695
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: Disallow mismatched GC-ness for physical promotions #90694
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make some methods public that we need to call. #90689
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Expose extension points needed by UnityLinker. #90688
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Implement IStatefulPinnedMarshalling test marshallers #90685
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [android] Switch to win 11 helix queue for devices #90683
    NO-MERGE
  • Add New Test to Monitor Number of Jitted Methods #90681
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add missing type forwards #90669
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc1' => 'release/8.0' #90668
    Servicing-approved, new-api-needs-documentation, area-codeflow
  • test #90666
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [HTTP/3] Release the stream once the response is sent #90659
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Switch fx_ver_t::as_str from stringstream to append/to_string #90652
    area-Host
  • [release/7.0][manual] Merge release/7.0-staging into release/7.0 #90648
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 7.0.x

Merged

  • Limit language version on Logger and Options source gens #90654
    area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • Remove incorrect comments from LinkContext #90690
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 9.0.0
  • Add types with marshallers that implement every method from the marshaller shapes #90634
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 9.0.0
  • [GC] Use RegisterFrozenSegment for STRESS_REGIONS #90523
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Do not set fetch depth on source-build #90703
    needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0-rc1] [release/8.0] Do not set fetch depth on source-build #90704
    area-Infrastructure
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Temporary fix for `ldp`/`stp` optimizations #90534
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "[JIT] ARM64 - Temporary fix for `ldp`/`stp` optimizations" #90699
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Collapse PortableAppWithException test app into PortableApp #90645
    area-Host
  • [release/8.0] Add doc for the new invoker classes #90636
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection
  • [release/8.0-rc1] [mono] Add a --path command line argument as an alternative to MONO_P… #90678
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Bump package version for net7 to 7.0.11 #90651
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0-rc1] [mono] Fix InlineArray tests on android platforms #90679
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix gcroot SOS command on arm/arm64 #90658
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Add missing type forwards #90673
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add Caller Allocated Buffer collection marshaller and interface #90107
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add Pinned collection parameter type #90103
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Fix NullableAttribute illink test failures #90680
    Servicing-approved, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Fix problems with `Assembler::ReflectionNotation()` #90655
    Servicing-approved, area-ILTools-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [ppc64le] Performance improvements while branching during function calls #90656
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [ppc64le] Performance improvements while branching during function calls #90367
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution, arch-ppc64le
  • Remove AggressiveOpt from CastHelpers.LdelemaRef/StelemRef #90412
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Unify with logging category matching #90642
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Annotate System.Linq.Expressions with RequiresDynamicCode #90616
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Linq.Expressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Fix InlineArray tests on android platforms #90583
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Add a --path command line argument as an alternative to MONO_P… #90544
    area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • Fix gcroot SOS command on arm/arm64 #90650
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [browser] Use browser cache in WasmApp-style projects by default #90662
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasi] Update README.md for wasiconsole template #90538
    arch-wasm, area-Meta
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc1' => 'release/8.0' #90628
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Return false from ComWrappers.Try... methods #90635
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Fix support for non-public default constructors using JsonIncludeAttribute #90615
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization implement normalization functions #90582
    os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • [ios] Add optimized property to the Native AOT sample app #90585
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [Mono] Re-enable tests as they are passing now #90533
    os-android
  • Add timeouts to SendReceive tests #90631
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Fix support for non-public default constructors using JsonIncludeAttribute #90612
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [workloads] Put quotes around GetFileName call when collecting telemetry #90588
    area-Build-mono, needs-area-label
  • [mono] Fix min alignment of structures with explicit layout. #90632
    area-Interop-mono, 8.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the error register in JIT_WriteBarrier. #90568
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [release/8.0-rc1] [workloads] Put quotes around GetFileName call when collecting telemetry #90606
    Servicing-approved, needs-area-label
  • Fix problems with `Assembler::ReflectionNotation()` #90565
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • [wasm] Pin chrome version for testing to 115.0.579.x #90643
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-rc1] [mono][ios] Revert LLVM mode for apple mobile tests #90624
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc1] [wasm] Pin chrome version for testing to 115.0.579.x #90644
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Limit language version on Logger and Options source gens #90709
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • Use corresponding exception message, if null passed #90505
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Bump main version to 9.0-alpha1 #90558
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Make `--skip-unresolved` the default when not running from SDK #90512
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Improve ArraySegment debugging #90488
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Support assignment to multiple refs in trim analyzer #90287
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Port NativeAOT exception handling to CoreCLR #88034
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Redo IL Verification #90418
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Improve filtering of candidate binding invocations in config binder gen #90619
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Substitute constant into loop testing variable where possible #90622
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve config binding gen parsing & make generation specs incremental #89587
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Made threadstatic helper call sites slightly simpler (static ctor case) #90641
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Update Get/SetFieldValue to Account for EnC #90623
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Support unloadability in `Microsoft.CSharp`. #89536
    area-Microsoft.CSharp, community-contribution
  • [WIP] source-build: don't skip building Native Aot artifacts. #88520
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement AppendAllBytes API #90364
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Reset OOB packages from September Release in the October Release #90561
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.x
  • Add `WidenLatin1ToUtf16_MisalignedAddress` #90319
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Check opportunistic ISAs in crossgen for CompExactlyDependsOn #90326
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [Mono][WIP]Enable runtime tests on android arm64 #89114
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Add a head merging transformation alongside the tail merging transformation #90468
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [PERF] Add hybrid globalization testing runs #89825
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [Mono][WIP] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Relink for non-unicode tests should be running. #89419
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Assembly resolving adjustments. #90601
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Avoid looking for dynamically accessed members when none are requested. #90154
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Optimize liveness fixpoint computation #89328
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][llvm] Prevent method to LLVM function mapping where possible #88914
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][llvm] Remove support for llvm versions before 14.x. #88346
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Notify jiterpreter when a method is freed #89980
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add boolean field to indicate whether or not the Windows thread pool is being used #90551
    area-System.Threading
  • CoreCLR: vm: arm: Fix gcc arm asm build error #86692
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-16
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT LLVM] Using together with .NET 8 SDK #2235
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Exception handling: outstanding tasks #2169

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Rewrite exception handling to support nested dispatch #2374

Updated

  • ManagedZLib: Console app for profiling inflate #2368
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add support for `JitDisasm` #2371
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hot Reload agent should not be loading all types from an updated assembly #34695
  • The FrameworkReference 'NETStandard.Library' was not recognized - Xamarin.Forms vs4mac #34662

Closed

  • Improve the first-run experience for workloads - detect common version mismatch scenarios and tell the user the actions to perform to resolve them #31872

PullRequests

Created

  • Backport of 'First-run workload experience #34322' to release/8.0.1xx #34694
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement automated cleanup of stage 0 #34693
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2245468 #34688
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add back the current version of MSBuild that got removed by accident in the CPM PR #34687
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix in Microsoft.NET.Sdk.DefaultItems.targets for .DS_Store causing build failures on MacOSX #34666
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Allow ArtifactsPath telemetry to flow #34660
    untriaged, Document for new feature, Area-NetSDK
  • Ran 'dotnet format' on sdk.sln #34659
    untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Fix runtime pack selection for `dotnet build` with PublishAot=true and PublishAotUsingRuntimePack=true #34658
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc1] Fix runtime pack selection for `dotnet build` with PublishAot=true and PublishAotUsingRuntimePack=true #34657
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK

Merged

  • Fix redist.csproj build failure on SLN rebuild in VS #34587
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • First-run workload experience #34322
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Enable the backport flow similar to other repos #34654
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Backport terminal logger enablement #34682
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove a nowarn line added for preview 1 #34345
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] One option for fixing the locked file issue in the test #34684
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Add WorkloadPublishProperties telemetry event #34681
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • reenable CI for the 1xx branch #34656
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc1] Add WorkloadPublishProperties telemetry event #34680
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [Containers] Implement OAuth token login for container registries #34678
    Area-Containers
  • MSBuild terminal logger enamblement. #34606
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Containers: implementation of OAuth2 #34237
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Fix runtime pack selection for `dotnet build` with PublishAot=true and PublishAotUsingRuntimePack=true #34640
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #34652
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add AdditionalRuntimeIdentifier if building from source #34650
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update onelocbuild to 8.0.1xx #34642
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable transitive pinning #34387
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update our TFM support and error messaging for 17.7 #34585
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add design proposal for workload history #30486
  • Download tool packages from NuGet feeds directly, instead of implicitly restoring #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Crossplatform ResourceUpdater #34394
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [wasm] Remove `UsingMicrosoftNETSdkBlazorWebAssembly` from Wasm SDK #34166
    untriaged, Area-WasmSdk
  • Copying the test project to the temporary folder is to change the hard coding of the tfm and package version #34624
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • When transforming web.config check if target framework is .NET Framework. #34618
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Add better error messages when we can't fetch manifests #34460
    untriaged, Area-Containers, 8.0.1xx
  • Add workload version subcommand Fixes #33912 #33996
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-16
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Collection expressions #5354
    12.0
  • String-based enums #2849
  • [Proposal]: Interceptors #7009
    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Create proposal for ExperimentalAttribute #7472

Merged

  • missed one anchor #7475
  • add anchor #7473
  • Update README.md #7471
  • Create LDM-questions-2023-08-15.md #7470

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Analyzer diagnostics are swallowed if first symbol location happened to be in generated code #69543
  • Assert when typing `await foreach` #69539
    17.8
  • IntelliSense incorrectly hard-selects `struct` after `record` #69537
  • Completion doesn't offer `method` completion for class with a primary constructor #69535

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34016.170 #69571
  • 3.1% allocations of `TypeConversions` #68997
    Compiler.Next
  • Extra closing parenthesis in local function breaks parsing for the rest of the file #58529
    Backlog
  • NRE in NullableWalker while editing code #67816
    17.8

PullRequests

Created

  • Support creating binlogs for the language server's design time builds #69572
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23416.3 #69570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23412.1 #69569
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23408.8 #69568
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23406.1 #69567
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23403.1 #69566
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23401.10 #69565
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove use of Environment.CurrentDirectory #69564
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23378.8 #69563
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23376.7 #69562
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23374.10 #69561
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23374.5 #69560
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23372.1 #69559
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23371.1 #69558
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23369.14 #69557
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23369.13 #69556
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23368.11 #69555
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23364.3 #69554
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23362.1 #69553
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23360.9 #69552
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23357.7 #69551
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23356.8 #69550
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23330.5 #69549
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.7.0-3.23366.1 #69548
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Filter out abstract types from the list of collection-initializable types #69546
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Consolidate code paths that create update edits #69545
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Update compiler toolset to latest #69544
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add support for reporting non-local LSP pull document diagnostics for open documents #69541
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid treating methods as SymbolCategory.Other #69540
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Semantic snippets - make `foreach` snippet work with `await` and async enumerables #69538
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Recommend `method` on primary constructors #69536
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix compliance warnings for NuGet packages #69547
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update 17.7 servicing branch queue #69528
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reduce `TypeConversions` allocations by caching them in AssemblySymbol #69040
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Explicitly filter down to constructible types before offering fixes #69542
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add formatting test for empty collection literal. #69534
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Improve error recovery when encountering errant close-paren tokens. #69482
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add analyzer/fixer to suggest changing code like `ImmutableArray.CreateBuilder<int>(); ...` to a collection expression. #69500
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Unsplit `NullableWalker` after `out` argument #69511
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, Next
  • Fix reassigned-variable-underlining with primary constructors #69530
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Extract a shared helper for walking statements for a few analyzers #69524
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Collection expressions: use inline arrays for collection expressions with span target types #69412
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2245608 #69366
  • Move csharp decompiler service down to features so it is available in vscode #69501
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Pool lexed token arrays in SyntaxParser. #69499
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Prototype of a public API (though currently internal) for roslyn features to expose the ability to report progress as they run. #50211
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid binding lambda body if fully typed #69505
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add BuildOnlyDiagnosticIds LSP request handler #69475
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Stop descending through tuple when no slot can be created #69513
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Fix TFM for function pointer expected output tests #69506
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Exceptions on AuthorizeView net8.0p7 #50129
  • UserManager.IsInRoleAsync(appUser, "rolename") and User.IsInrole("rolename") may return different results #50125
  • Blazor multiple authentication schemes do not play nice with RenderModeServer #50122
  • Header and Footer Inconsistencies (scrolling and transparency issues) #50121
  • Perf regression: fortunes, single_query #50118
  • Perf improvement: json #50117
  • Can't go to the View in Areas #50115
  • Add a DefaultPolicy property on AuthorizeRouteView to be used when no Policies are set on a component #50111
  • Perf regression: caching #50109
  • Perf improvement: mvc, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter, plainTextWithFilter #50108
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, plainTextEmptyFilter, plainTextSansFilter #50107
  • Perf improvement: plainTextEmptyFilter, plainTextSansFilter, plainTextWithFilter #50106
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, mapaction, plainTextWithFilter #50105
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, mapaction, plainTextEmptyFilter #50104
  • Perf improvement: plainTextEmptyFilter, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter, plainTextWithFilter #50103
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, mapaction, plainTextSansFilter #50102
  • support AttributeUsage AttributeTargets.Class for minimal api handlers #50101
  • `UrlHelperExtensions.Page` from headless code without any `Page` #50099
  • Memory Leak on .Net 7 but not 6 #50097
  • "CreateEmptyBuilder" but a little more robust #50096

Closed

  • Perf regression: ApiCrudGetProductDetails, ApiCrudListProducts #49986
  • Conditional css class syntax in blazor #50035
    Backlog
  • CS0433 The type 'IEmailSender' exists in both 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.UI and Microsoft.Extensions.Identity.Core #50075
  • Referenced pages are not found #50100
  • Blazor time to first UI improvement: blazorwasmbenchmark #48861
  • Blazor Server: Read image saved as blob as base 64 string #49552
  • Curious Blazor (Server) Behavior with Html Table Containing Input Elements #50038
  • .NET 8.0.0-preview.7 Blazor Web Template Get Stuck in Loading with Kestrel #50066
  • Inconsistency behaviour between `app.UseExceptionHandler()` and `app.UseExceptionHandler(_=> { })` #50049
  • A11y_.NETCore_ASP.NETCore_About_UseOfColor: Only color is used for "About" link and underline is not provided. #49676
    8.0-rc1
  • Localize standard DataAnnotations in ASP.NET Core MVC #33073
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Perf improvement: json #50086

PullRequests

Created

  • Styling Update for Header and Footer Elements #50130
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Add feature to expose IIS hosting details #50128
    area-runtime
  • [release/8.0-rc1] [Blazor] Add APIs for "enhanced refresh" #50124
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor
  • Fix IndexOutOfRangeException when an added/removed attribute spans a buffer size boundary #50110
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc2

Merged

  • Update Helix to Fedora 38 #50123
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Move Symreader dependency to ToolsetDependencies #50116
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix typo in src/Security/Authentication/Core/src/AuthenticationHandle… #50114
    area-security, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1
  • [blazor][E2E test] BootResourceCachingTest.IncrementallyUpdatesCache faster #50021
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2245323 #49575
    area-mvc
  • Support resolving keyed services from DI in RDF and RDG #50095
    Servicing-consider, feature-rdg, area-minimal, feature-rdf
  • [SignalR][TS client] Stateful reconnect #49940
    area-signalr, feature-client-javascript
  • [SignalR] Pass new App to Transport Pipe to App layer #49650
    area-signalr
  • Support hot reload for Blazor component endpoints #50031
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Add APIs for "enhanced refresh" #50068
    area-blazor
  • Add support for F# `Async<'T>` as an awaitable type in minimal APIs #46898
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-minimal

  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-rc.1.23407.2 #49911
